data.name: Monster Orb, The Game We Play (Ft. N.T)
data.detailed_description:
The Steam release of Monster Orb, The Game We Play (ft. N.T) by Lil Wawa.

An amazing collaboration that have been in the works for 2 years.

Monster Orb, The Game We Play is a song made by Lil Wawa and N.T for the trading card game "Monster Orb".

This song is featured in Daring Academy.

Monster Orb, The Game We Play includes the song both MP3 and FLAC file.
